General.Name: Berentzen Gruppe AG
General.Description: Berentzen-Gruppe Aktiengesellschaft produces and sells spirits and non-alcoholic beverages for the food retail and hospitality sectors in Germany, rest of Europe, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Spirits, Non-alcoholic Beverages, and Fresh Juice Systems. It provides non-alcoholic beverages, including mineral waters, lemonades, cola, and mate and energy drinks; spirits; and fruit presses and juicers, and bottling systems, as well as oranges. The company markets, distributes, and sells its products under the Berentzen, Puschkin, Tres Países, Strothmann Original, Doornkaat, Bommerlunder Aquavit, Echt Stonsdorfer, Hansen Rum, Springer Urvater, POLAR, Dirty Harry, Pabst & Richarz, Cider, MIO MIO, Kräuterbraut, Emsland Quelle, Emsland Sonne, Emsland Perle Light, Märkisch Kristall, Vivaris Sport, Sankt Ansgari, Quixx Energy, Sinalco, Citrocasa, Frutas Naturales, and other brand names. It also provides dealer brands and private-label spirits. The company was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Haselünne, Germany.
